title: Download
subtitle: Get the client from the options below
privateServersSubtitle: Direct APK downloads for other servers
guideSubtitle: Select your platform for setup instructions

windows.label: Windows
steps: Download and install an Android emulator (BlueStacks, NoxPlayer, or Google Play Games on PC recommended)
Launch the emulator and wait for initialization
Drag the downloaded .apk file into the emulator window, or click "Install APK" to select the file
Once installed, tap the game icon on the emulator home screen to launch

apple.label: iOS / macOS
steps: iOS and macOS cannot run .apk files directly — a cloud phone service is required
Sign up for a cloud phone platform (e.g. Genymotion Cloud, Amazon AWS Device Farm, or Redfinger)
Upload or download the .apk file in the cloud phone and install it
Once installed, you can play the game via the cloud phone from any device

android.label: Android
steps: Tap the download button below to save the .apk file to your phone
Open your file manager and locate the downloaded .apk file, then tap to install
If prompted about "unknown sources", go to Settings and allow installing unknown apps
Once installed, open the game and enjoy
